data.name: Format phone number - Mobile App
data.description: # Storyline You work at "PineApple inc." and you are mobile software developer. Your task is to write a code for app called "Phone" which will try the best to format given digits to a valid formated phone number. ## Phone number breakdown +[country code] [space] [zone code] [space] [personal code] --- --- #### Important parts* In a number there **may be** parts you should format because they are treated as 'important'. These parts are country, zone, personal code: - [country code] are digits in the very beginning. **May be any length**. - [zone code] are exactly **3 digits** after country code. - [personal code] follows after these two. And always has the same pattern which is **3 digits**, **2 digits** and **2 digits**. And spaced as well. (i.e. 714 90 80) The parts are mutually exclusive. #### However It may be dedicated number, in that case you should return it without "+" sign and do not apply formatting (i.e. 911). **ATTENTION**: there also may be numbers like 474747, they **should be** formated (see below) ^_^ --- ## Conditions 1. Should be with "+" sign at the beginning 1. **May be any length.** (up to MAX_SAFE_INTEGER) * if number length is 1, 2 or 3, should return without "+" sign * if number length is 5, should be formated as "+5 00 60" * if number length is 6, should be formated as "47 47 47", without "+" sign 1. Important parts* (country, zone code) of the number should be spaced [look at examples]. --- # Examples: ```python Empty => "" 1 => "1" 20 => "20" 911 => "911" 1234 => "+1 234" 50060 => "+5 00 60" 474747 => "47 47 47" 7940714 => "+7 940 714" 79407149080 => "+7 940 714 90 80" 7160009407149080 => "+716000 940 714 90 80" ``` --- # Note that: ``` All numbers came from author's imagination ;) API`s, that could help you directly formate numbers, are disabled. ``` --- ## Check 'Format phone number' series: [Format phone number by template](https://www.codewars.com/kata/61393fd03e441f001ac9c7d4) [Format phone number - Mobile App](https://www.codewars.com/kata/613b369bd0b62f003e8b8c03)
